ValidationRule.description: The Activity Job Definition Template, Activity, Job Definition Template and POS Template must have the same Sales Org.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( TEXT(cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__r.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c) <> TEXT(cgcloud__Sales_Org__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Job_Definition_List__r.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c) <> TEXT(cgcloud__Sales_Org__c), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(cgcloud__POS_Template__c)), TEXT(cgcloud__POS_Template__r.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c) <> TEXT(cgcloud__Sales_Org__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Activity Job Definition Template, Activity, Job Definition Template and POS Template must have the same Sales Org.
